body.raw:
### Hey Legend 😊,

My background is primarily in mobile application development with React Native, but I dabble with all kinds of programming—from web applications to command-line tools. You can subscribe to receive an article straight into your inbox every Sunday on my [Substack](https://daveclintonn.substack.com/).

My posts are a collaborative space, so feel free to reply if:

🧰 There’s a topic you’re curious about and would love to read about on my blog.  
🪜 You know about good resources that could benefit fellow aspiring Software Engineers.  
😁 You just want to say hello. :

I will always be happy to share more with you. Check out my about here :) [About](/about) section.

I am currenlty playing around with [globe.gl](https://globe.gl/) to add insightful analytics to this page, check it out [here](/analytics)
